018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.log;
019
020import java.util.List;
021
022/**
023 * Interface for distributed log storage.
024 *
025 * <p>This interface defines operations for storing and querying logs
026 * from distributed workflow execution across multiple nodes.</p>
027 *
028 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
029 */
030public interface DistributedLogStore extends AutoCloseable {
031
032    /**
033     * Starts a new workflow execution session.
034     *
035     * @param workflowName name of the workflow being executed
036     * @param nodeCount number of nodes participating in this session
037     * @return session ID for subsequent log entries
038     */
039    long startSession(String workflowName, int nodeCount);
040
041    /**
042     * Starts a new workflow execution session with overlay and inventory info.
043     *
044     * @param workflowName name of the workflow being executed
045     * @param overlayName name of the overlay being used (may be null)
046     * @param inventoryName name of the inventory file being used (may be null)
047     * @param nodeCount number of nodes participating in this session
048     * @return session ID for subsequent log entries
049     */
050    long startSession(String workflowName, String overlayName, String inventoryName, int nodeCount);
051
052    /**
053     * Starts a new workflow execution session with full execution context.
054     *
055     * @param workflowName name of the workflow being executed
056     * @param overlayName name of the overlay being used (may be null)
057     * @param inventoryName name of the inventory file being used (may be null)
058     * @param nodeCount number of nodes participating in this session
059     * @param cwd current working directory
060     * @param gitCommit git commit hash of the workflow directory (may be null)
061     * @param gitBranch git branch name (may be null)
062     * @param commandLine the command line used to invoke actor-IaC
063     * @param actorIacVersion actor-IaC version
064     * @param actorIacCommit actor-IaC git commit hash (may be null)
065     * @return session ID for subsequent log entries
066     */
067    default long startSession(String workflowName, String overlayName, String inventoryName, int nodeCount,
068                              String cwd, String gitCommit, String gitBranch,
069                              String commandLine, String actorIacVersion, String actorIacCommit) {
070        // Default implementation for backward compatibility
071        return startSession(workflowName, overlayName, inventoryName, nodeCount);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Records a log entry.
076     *
077     * @param sessionId session ID from startSession()
078     * @param nodeId identifier of the node generating this log
079     * @param level log level
080     * @param message log message
081     */
082    void log(long sessionId, String nodeId, LogLevel level, String message);
083
084    /**
085     * Records a log entry with transition context.
086     *
087     * @param sessionId session ID from startSession()
088     * @param nodeId identifier of the node
089     * @param label current label in workflow
090     * @param level log level
091     * @param message log message
092     */
093    void log(long sessionId, String nodeId, String label, LogLevel level, String message);
094
095    /**
096     * Records an action result.
097     *
098     * @param sessionId session ID
099     * @param nodeId node identifier
100     * @param label label
101     * @param actionName action/method name
102     * @param exitCode command exit code (0 for success)
103     * @param durationMs execution duration in milliseconds
104     * @param output command output or result message
105     */
106    void logAction(long sessionId, String nodeId, String label,
107                   String actionName, int exitCode, long durationMs, String output);
108
109    /**
110     * Marks a node as succeeded in this session.
111     *
112     * @param sessionId session ID
113     * @param nodeId node identifier
114     */
115    void markNodeSuccess(long sessionId, String nodeId);
116
117    /**
118     * Marks a node as failed in this session.
119     *
120     * @param sessionId session ID
121     * @param nodeId node identifier
122     * @param reason failure reason
123     */
124    void markNodeFailed(long sessionId, String nodeId, String reason);
125
126    /**
127     * Ends a session with the given status.
128     *
129     * @param sessionId session ID
130     * @param status final status
131     */
132    void endSession(long sessionId, SessionStatus status);
133
134    /**
135     * Retrieves all log entries for a specific node in a session.
136     *
137     * @param sessionId session ID
138     * @param nodeId node identifier
139     * @return list of log entries
140     */
141    List<LogEntry> getLogsByNode(long sessionId, String nodeId);
142
143    /**
144     * Retrieves log entries filtered by level.
145     *
146     * @param sessionId session ID
147     * @param minLevel minimum log level to include
148     * @return list of log entries
149     */
150    List<LogEntry> getLogsByLevel(long sessionId, LogLevel minLevel);
151
152    /**
153     * Retrieves error logs for a session.
154     *
155     * @param sessionId session ID
156     * @return list of error log entries
157     */
158    default List<LogEntry> getErrors(long sessionId) {
159        return getLogsByLevel(sessionId, LogLevel.ERROR);
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Gets a summary of the session.
164     *
165     * @param sessionId session ID
166     * @return session summary
167     */
168    SessionSummary getSummary(long sessionId);
169
170    /**
171     * Gets the most recent session ID.
172     *
173     * @return latest session ID, or -1 if no sessions exist
174     */
175    long getLatestSessionId();
176
177    /**
178     * Lists all sessions.
179     *
180     * @param limit maximum number of sessions to return
181     * @return list of session summaries
182     */
183    List<SessionSummary> listSessions(int limit);
184}
